lead_paragraph: Sheri Yan was sentenced for participating in a scheme to pay thousands of dollars in bribes to John W. Ashe, the former president of the United Nations General Assembly.

headline.print_headline: Woman in U.N. Bribery Scandal Receives 20 Months in Prison
headline.main: Woman Involved in U.N. Corruption Case Is Given 20 Months in Prison

snippet: Sheri Yan was sentenced for participating in a scheme to pay thousands of dollars in bribes to John W. Ashe, the former president of the United Nations General Assembly....
